text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump •
70 Days of Denials, Delays & Dysfunction
•
— The first alarms of a novel coronavirus outbreak in China were sounded in early January. The Trump administration then wasted 70 days not preparing — Which Americans will now pay for — With our lives. —
•
 https://t.co/d7WcP76FkC
